body_content.explanation: an occasion when you allow someone or yourself to have something enjoyable, especially more than is good for you:
examples: All the pleasures and indulgences of the weekend are over, and I must get down to some serious hard work.
His health suffered from over-indulgence in (= too much) rich food and drink.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when you allow or do not mind someone's failure or bad behaviour:
examples: My inability to do needlework was treated with surprising indulgence by my teacher.
